name: Mine Your Step
description:
Put your mine detecting skills to the test! 

Sweep the ground to find mines, when the detector is near a mine, the mine detector will beep faster. Place your flag as close to the center of the mine as possible for a higher score but be careful! If you step on a mine, you will receive a deduction of 10 points per death and you will be forced to start over and the mines will be in new positions! 

Compete with your friends to see who gets the higher score!

Challenges:

  • Military Recruit - Gamifying
  • Simulation to the MetaVerse
  • Digital Twin
  • Original Art

Team J-Squad Members:

  • Julia Galimidi - Programmer
  • Josh Garriss - Artist
  • Juan Rivera - Programmer
  • Joseph Gallup - Programmer/UI Developer
